Unequal's protective power gives me a whole new level of confidence in my game. It makes me feel invincible. Before serving 18 months in federal prison on charges related to his role in a dog fighting ring, Michael Vick was the National Football League's highest-paid player and one of the most desired endorsers in sports.

I never imagined-even in my wildest dreams-that we would get as far, as fast as we have today,'' Mr. Eric Schmidt href="http://googleblog.blogspot.com/2011/01/update-from-chairman.html"> said in a post on the Official Google Blog. Search has quite literally changed people's lives-increasing the collective sum of the world's knowledge and revolutionizing advertising in the process. And our emerging businesses-display, Android, YouTube and Chrome-are on fire. Of course, like any successful organization we've had our fair share of good luck, but the entire team-now over 24,000 Googlers globally-deserves most of the credit. Google's co-founders brought in Mr. Eric Schmidt , a trained computer scientist, to shepherd the young company along in the early days of the dot-com boom and eventually he helped take Google public in 2004. I've never believed there should be a cut-off age for talent, and we are going to put our money where our mouths are with the$ 5 million recording contract, Simon Cowell said.
